content: Continuing from https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/185405-t-compiler.2Frust-analyzer/topic/new.20salsa.20panic.3F, the Windows 10 tar is a bit weird: it can unpack .tar.gz, but not .gz.
I'd prefer we would use ZIP for every platform, it's a better format than .tar.gz, not that it matters if we have a single file
Zip isn't a great format either. Among other things it has two separate directory listings that are not necessarily in sync.
